channel.title: Members and Staff please read
channel.description:
[center]If you do now wish staff members you may eliminate this post.[/center]
Dear MoparScape.org
I am at present on a staff computer. I wish to report to you that my system has crashed due to errors of compatibility. I may not be able to respond to any replies or make any posts for a while, and because of this I will appoint staff members to speak in my place and I give you my solid word of honor that their coding skills are very high. Now I hope that I do not find any belligerence between members of the forums and members of my staff while I am absent. If there is by chance any trouble with a staff member you can report them by going through LegendScape.net and the matter will be settled immediately. If further problems arise you may contact me via E-mail Administrator@legendScape.net.
Sincerely LegendScape Administrator.

item.title: Members and Staff please read
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Wow. Hope to see you back soon

Read full topic

Dam, thats really professional. Thanks for letting everyone know
